item.title: [508] bulby based almost 100% slayer, adding level requirement. 89 errors
item.dc:creator: @sponge_bong sponge bong
item.description:
@sponge_bong wrote:

i added this in playernpccombat.java if(n.isDead == true) { if((n.npcType == 1648)) { if(p.skillLvl[18] < 5) p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 5 Slayer to slay this monster."); p.addSkillXP(80*p.skillLvl[18], 18); } }
everything works but the requirements? can someone help me get slayer requirements working? please.

item.title: [508] bulby based almost 100% slayer, adding level requirement. 89 errors
item.dc:creator: @sponge_bong sponge bong
item.description:
@sponge_bong wrote:

ok i get 89 errors adding this. i think this is sumething like its suppose to look, if(n.isDead == true) { if((n.npcType == 1648)) { if(player.skillLvl[18] < 5) { player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You need level 5 Slayer to slay this monster."); } else { p.addSkillXP(80*p.skillLvl[18], 18); } } i could be wrong though, but when i add that i get 89 errors. please help.
